sentences.en: A little note of hysteria crept into Tonder's laughter.
sentences.cn: 托德的笑声里带了点歇斯底里的音调.

sentences.en: All the lights went off, and mass hysteria broke out.
sentences.cn: 所有的灯都熄灭了，大家都变得歇斯底里起来。

sentences.en: By now, she was screaming, completely overcome with hysteria.
sentences.cn: 现在她正在尖叫，完全处于癔病发作状态。

sentences.en: Connie had recovered from her hysteria.
sentences.cn: 康妮从歇斯底里中恢复过来了.
最后狂暴情绪平息了下来.

sentences.en: For a moment he was seized by a kind of hysteria.
sentences.cn: 刹那间他变得歇斯底里起来.

sentences.en: He could whip a crowd into hysteria.
sentences.cn: 他能让一群人变得歇斯底里。

sentences.en: His voice teetered on the edge of hysteria.
sentences.cn: 他的声音近乎歇斯底里。

sentences.en: In a fit of hysteria, Silvia blamed me for causing her father’s death.
sentences.cn: 西尔维娅一阵歇斯底里，指责我害死了她父亲。

sentences.en: No one could help getting carried away by the hysteria.
sentences.cn: 所有人都不由自主地受到狂热情绪的感染。

sentences.en: Several were hurt in the panic. "It was mass hysteria," said Rev John Borders.
sentences.cn: 数人在恐慌中受了伤。“人们都疯了，”约翰·博德斯牧师说。

sentences.en: She had worked herself into hysteria again.
sentences.cn: 她说着说着又歇斯底里大发作了.

sentences.en: The political hysteria soon wearied him and he dropped the newspaper to the floor.
sentences.cn: 政界的歇斯底里让他厌烦，他把报纸扔到了地板上。

sentences.en: Their grief turned to hysteria when the funeral procession arrived at the cemetery.
sentences.cn: 当送葬队走到墓地时，他们更加悲恸欲绝。

sentences.en: There was mass hysteria when the band came on stage.
sentences.cn: 乐队登台时观众一片疯狂。

sentences.en: There's a very thin dividing line between joviality and hysteria.
sentences.cn: 激动和歇斯底里之间就一线之隔。
